verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, drawing me Unto Yourself, Father, closer draw. Your desiring my inquiring Stirs my heart to heed Your call.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gracious, Christ Jesus No other name given among men Revealing Your redeeming Each day new heart ground You win.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nearness, “God with us”, Yet, Spirit, You I barely know. Living, be leading In fullness fill and overflow.{/lang-eng}
